class Yearly[source]

Yearly(seasonality:int=1, horizon:int=6, freq:str='Y', sheet_name:str='M3Year', name:str='Yearly')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Quarterly[source]

Quarterly(seasonality:int=4, horizon:int=8, freq:str='Q', sheet_name:str='M3Quart', name:str='Quarterly')

Quarterly(seasonality: int = 4, horizon: int = 8, freq: str = 'Q', sheet_name: str = 'M3Quart', name: str = 'Quarterly')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Monthly[source]

Monthly(seasonality:int=12, horizon:int=18, freq:str='M', sheet_name:str='M3Month', name:str='Monthly')

Monthly(seasonality: int = 12, horizon: int = 18, freq: str = 'M', sheet_name: str = 'M3Month', name: str = 'Monthly')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Other[source]

Other(seasonality:int=1, horizon:int=8, freq:str='D', sheet_name:str='M3Other', name:str='Other')

class M3[source]

M3(S:DataFrame, X:DataFrame, Y:DataFrame, idx_categorical_static:Optional[List[T]]=None, group:Union[str, List[str]]=None) :: TimeSeriesDataclass

M3(S: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, X: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, Y: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, idx_categorical_static: Union[List, NoneType] = None, group: Union[str, List[str]] = None)

{% endraw %}

Observaciones:

  1. Hay series mensuales que no tienen a침o de inicio, en este caso iniciar치n en 1970.
  2. Las series Other no tienen fecha como tal. Ser치n consideradas como diarias y empezar치n en 1970.
{% raw %} 
for group in M3Info.groups:
    print(group)
    m3_dataset = M3.load(directory='data', group=group)
    print(m3_dataset.ts_tensor)
